questions.question: What is the dominant color of the packaging, as observed in the provided image?
Considering the visible text and design, what is the primary brand name featured prominently on the packaging?
Based on the image, what is the primary ingredient explicitly mentioned on the label?
What is the shape of the package, as it can be inferred from the visible section?
Does the packaging prominently display any certifications or labels relating to dietary restrictions (such as veganism)?
What language is used for the majority of the text visible on the product packaging?
Judging from the image, is there a noticeable texture to the packaging material?
What is the general style of the text font used for the primary product information?

Does the packaging indicate a country of origin for the main ingredient?
Does the visible packaging showcase any images or illustrations besides text?
What is indicated as a potential contaminant based on the cautionary statement visible on the package?
